definition: appointed by nomination, the category of nouns serving as the grammatical subject of a verb
details:
adjective
- appointed by nomination
= synonyms: nominated
- named
= synonyms: nominal
- serving as or indicating the subject of a verb and words identified with the subject of a copular verb
= example: serving as or indicating the subject of a verb and words identified with the subject of a copular verb
noun
- the category of nouns serving as the grammatical subject of a verb
= synonyms: nominative case, subject case
